creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
description: nearly square format; four lines of text in a block; two smaller characters at left; red seal below smaller characters; another red seal, URC
text:
Green mountains, red leaves, an evening view—
White hut, no people, autumn colors chilly.
Suddenly I see on my paper window the shadows of twisting pines;
One sliver of new moon has risen above the balustrade.
title: Evening View
